Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1981...
Injured on 8/17/1983 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off John Malone (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/1985, off Sal Aranda (PEN)...
Injured on 6/18/1988 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1990, hitting .455 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/11/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $1,403,000 per year...
Injured on 6/26/1991 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1992, hitting .391 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
